sledgehammer.npc.behavior

Class Behavior

  • java.lang.Object
    • sledgehammer.util.Printable
      • sledgehammer.npc.behavior.Behavior
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BehaviorSurvive

    public abstract class Behavior
extends Printable
    Class to handle NPCs with a passive, long-term behavior pattern. This class provides utilities and executes Actions for the NPC to act on.
    Author:
    Jab
